text: The 2016 Southern Conference men's soccer season was the 21st season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The UNC Greensboro Spartans are the defending regular season champions, and the Furman Paladins are the defending tournament champions. == Changes from 2015 == * None == Teams == === Stadia and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
